original_title: NWA Clash of The Champions VII: Guts & Glory
overview: Clash of the Champions VII took place on June 14, 1989 at the Ritz-Epps Fitness Center in Fort Bragg, North Carolina. The show drew a 3.8 rating on TBS. This show was used to build the Great American Bash 1989 PPV on July 23.
title: NWA Clash of The Champions VII: Guts & Glory
